headline.main: Zambia's Top Court Gives Opposition Extra Time in Election Row
headline.print_headline: Zambia's Top Court Gives Opposition Extra Time in Election Row

docs.snippet: Zambia's Constitutional Court ruled early on Saturday that a challenge to President Edgar Lungu's re-election at the helm of Africa's second-largest copper producer would be extended into next week to give the opposition more side to present its c...
docs.lead_paragraph: Zambia's Constitutional Court ruled early on Saturday that a challenge to President Edgar Lungu's re-election at the helm of Africa's second-largest copper producer would be extended into next week to give the opposition more side to present its case.

headline.main: Moore, Hahn Share Lead in Boston
headline.print_headline: Moore, Hahn Share Lead in Boston

docs.snippet: Ryan Moore changed his schedule to pile up tournaments at the end of the year with hopes of getting into a rhythm going into the FedEx Cup playoffs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ryan Moore changed his schedule to pile up tournaments at the end of the year with hopes of getting into a rhythm going into the FedEx Cup playoffs.

headline.main: Hermine Pounds Florida, Then Churns North Into Carolinas
headline.print_headline: Hermine Pounds Florida, Then Churns North Into Carolinas

docs.snippet: Hurricane Hermine wreaked havoc across Florida on Friday, causing widespread power outages and flooding before diminishing into a tropical storm and plowing up the Atlantic Coast into the Carolinas with a still-potent mix of high winds and heavy r...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hurricane Hermine wreaked havoc across Florida on Friday, causing widespread power outages and flooding before diminishing into a tropical storm and plowing up the Atlantic Coast into the Carolinas with a still-potent mix of high winds and heavy rains.

headline.main: Florida Coastal Town Battered, Bruised but Not Beaten by Hermine
headline.print_headline: Florida Coastal Town Battered, Bruised but Not Beaten by Hermine

docs.snippet: Florida residents found power lines down and water rushing into their homes after Hurricane Hermine cut across the state on Friday, with many feeling they had dodged what could have been a much worse blow from a tempest predicted to be life-threat...
docs.lead_paragraph: Florida residents found power lines down and water rushing into their homes after Hurricane Hermine cut across the state on Friday, with many feeling they had dodged what could have been a much worse blow from a tempest predicted to be life-threatening.

headline.main: Friday Night Music: New From Pavo Pavo
Another Texas Death Row Inmate Gets Reprieve
headline.print_headline: Another Texas Death Row Inmate Gets Reprieve

docs.snippet: The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals on Friday halted the execution scheduled for later this month of a man convicted of killing a Houston police officer 28 years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Texas Court of Criminal Appeals on Friday halted the execution scheduled for later this month of a man convicted of killing a Houston police officer 28 years ago.

headline.main: EPA: Flint's New Water Will Need 3 Months or More of Testing
headline.print_headline: EPA: Flint's New Water Will Need 3 Months or More of Testing

docs.snippet: Federal officials say it will take at least three months of testing before Flint can distribute water from a new pipeline in the wake of its crisis with lead-tainted water....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal officials say it will take at least three months of testing before Flint can distribute water from a new pipeline in the wake of its crisis with lead-tainted water.

headline.main: Man Charged With Threatening Sandy Hook School
headline.print_headline: Man Charged With Threatening Sandy Hook School

docs.snippet: A Connecticut man is accused of phoning in a threat to the new Sandy Hook Elementary School, which replaced the building that was demolished after 20 children and six educators were shot to death there in 2012....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Connecticut man is accused of phoning in a threat to the new Sandy Hook Elementary School, which replaced the building that was demolished after 20 children and six educators were shot to death there in 2012.

headline.main: 2 Fray Members Get Writing Credit on Chainsmokers' No.1 Hit
headline.print_headline: 2 Fray Members Get Writing Credit on Chainsmokers' No.1 Hit

headline.main: Researchers: Latin American Women Got Women Into UN Charter
headline.print_headline: Researchers: Latin American Women Got Women Into UN Charter

docs.snippet: Eleanor Roosevelt gets the credit for championing women's rights at the United Nations but two researchers have found that the real heroines responsible for getting women into the U.N. Charter are from Latin America, led by a little-known Brazilia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Eleanor Roosevelt gets the credit for championing women's rights at the United Nations but two researchers have found that the real heroines responsible for getting women into the U.N. Charter are from Latin America, led by a little-known Brazilian.
